thread.title: Animal Rescue of New Orleans gala raises money for permanent shelter and honors a dedicated supporter | NOLA.com
thread.title_full: Animal Rescue of New Orleans gala raises money for permanent shelter and honors a dedicated supporter | NOLA.com

author: Sue Strachan, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Animal Rescue of New Orleans gala raises money for permanent shelter and honors a dedicated supporter | NOLA.com
text:
Dogs mixed and mingled with humans at Animal Rescue of New Orleans' "Un Refuge de l'Orage III," a fundraising cocktail party that saw pups enjoying treats galore as well as adoring gazes from partygoers there to support this no-kill shelter.
The appealing setting on Friday (Oct. 9) was the home and garden of Paulette and Frank Stewart , where two-legged and four-legged guests enjoyed the mild evening temperatures. A silent auction, food and libations (especially the wine and champagne bar), and a performance by Hot Mess, with vocalist Margie Perez, proved popular.
The evening was dedicated to Beverly Lore , the founder Angels of ARNO, a committee of animal lovers and philanthropists who are dedicated to raising money so ARNO can purchase a permanent space, as it is still in a rented warehouse.
